constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: KEYACH Name: Tolworth Key Area of Change
ART4 Name: Tolworth District Centre Inset Area
DISIA Name: Tolworth District Centre Inset Area
AIRCZ Type:: Gatwick Airport Wind Turbine Consultation Zone:Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Gatwick Airport Limited, 7th Floor Destinations Place, London Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH06 0NP

description: Application for Approval of Condition 3 (Cycle Parking Storage) of Planning Permission ref 19/01490/FUL (Proposed roof extension to a top floor flat and conversion of a single self-contained flat into 2 x self-contained flats) dated 30/08/2019
decision_conditions: That the applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above are agreed and that the condition, as noted above, is fully discharged.

In dealing with the application the Council has implemented the requirement in the National Planning Policy Framework to work with the applicant in a positive and proactive way.  We have made available detailed advice in the form or our statutory policies in the Core Strategy, Supplementary Planning Documents, Planning Briefs and other informal written guidance, as well as offering a full pre-application advice service, in order to ensure that the applicant has been given every opportunity to submit an application which is likely to be considered favourably.

Please provide revised copies of all proposed elevations at a recognised scale of 1:50 or 1:100, providing a scale bar, showing all elevations not just part and indicating all key dimensions for the proposed work.Please note all drawings to be correctly titled as "Proposed". (submitted drawing are titled as Existing)
